articles.author: Jon Murray, The Spot
articles.summary:
Denver Mayor Michael Hancock speaks to supporters during his February 2015 re-
election campaign kickoff with his wife, Mary Louise Lee.
articles.title: Denver bans city travel to Indiana over "religious freedom" law (Denver Post)

articles.author: Shandra Martinez | smartinez@mlive.com
articles.summary:
Kate Spade, Michael Kors and Sperry will be among 74 retailers in the much
anticipated Tanger Outlet mall that will open July 31 in West Michigan.
articles.title: Tanger Outlet: See nearly complete list of stores coming to new Byron Township mall (Grand Rapids Press)

articles.author: S.A. Miller
articles.summary:
The fate of Maryland's notorious "rain tax" now largely rests with one man --
House Speaker Michael E. Busch -- after the state Senate last week unanimously
approved a bill that would end the state-mandated fee.

Democrats, who hold overwhelming majorities in the General Assembly, have sent
mixed signals about ...
articles.title: Michael Busch holds fate of Maryland 'rain tax' bill (Washington Times)
